class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        counter = collections.defaultdict(list)
        maxn = []
        for i in range(n // 2) :
            maxv = max(nums[i],nums[-1-i],k-nums[i],k-nums[-1-i])
            maxn.append(maxv)
            counter[abs(nums[i]-nums[-1-i])].append(maxv)
        maxn = sorted(maxn)
        
        to_ret = 1e99
        for kt in counter :
            counter[kt] = sorted(counter[kt])
            to_change = n // 2 - len(counter[kt])
            to_change += bisect.bisect(maxn, kt-.1)
            to_change -= bisect.bisect(counter[kt], kt-.1)
            to_ret = min(to_ret, to_change)
        return to_ret
